full_summary:
# Videoconference Maintenance Agreement
## Contrat d’entretien de l’équipement de vidéoconférence

### Background
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking the provision and maintenance of its videoconference equipment infrastructure. This agreement will cover monitoring, preventive and corrective maintenance, support, and ad hoc work requirements for OSFI’s four locations across Canada.

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 20221312
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-31T14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 2

### Contract Terms

* **Contract Start Date**: 2023-09-01
* **Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

### UNSPSC Codes
* Video conferencing software maintenance
* Videoconferencing service

### Procurement Method
This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) with a competitive open bidding method. The selection criteria are based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Regions of Opportunity
The agreement covers the following regions:
* Ontario (except NCR)
* Canada
* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Quebec (except NCR)

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions, located at 255 Albert Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H2, Canada.

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Himani Joshi
* **Email**: Himani.Joshi@osfi-bsif.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (236) 334-9199

### Attachments
The tender documents are available for download at the following links:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6615/20221312_request-for-proposal_e-amd001.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6615/20221312_request-for-proposal_en_0.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6615/20221312_request-for-proposal_f-mod001.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender
